text: Shin ɗayanku na son cewa wani lambu ya kasance a gare shi daga dabinai da inabobi' maremari suna gudana daga ƙarƙashinsa, yana da, a cikinsa daga kowane 'ya'yan itace, kuma tsufa ya same shi, alhali kuwa yana da zuriyya masu rauni sai guguwa wadda take a cikinta akwai wuta, ta same shi, har ta ƙone? Kamar wancan ne Allah Yana bayyanawar ayoyi a gare ku, tsammaninku kuna tunani
